name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Ruby on Rails**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Django**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, with hands-on expertise in building scalable applications. Experienced in utilizing **Git**, **GitHub**, **GitLab**, and implementing CI/CD automation with **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** to streamline development processes. Equipped with strong knowledge of cloud services like **AWS** and **Heroku** for deploying robust, cloud-native applications.

Skilled in testing frameworks like **RSpec**, **Minitest**, and **Capybara** to ensure software quality and reliability. Known for effective collaboration in agile environments using tools like **Slack**, **Monday**, and **Notion**, while focusing on achieving team objectives and driving project success through OKRs.

Brings a rich background in creating secure, maintainable applications with a strong emphasis on meeting compliance standards. Passionate about developing systems that not only utilize cutting-edge technologies but also provide tangible benefits to end-users and stakeholders.
